item.title: Internal block/lift left in disgusting state, 22nd July
item.description:
I’m not usually inclined to report such incidents but this mess has been going on since last Monday from builders who are renovating their flat (no: 9) 4th floor. The stairs are filthy, dust and the lift floor has been severely marked/walls, floors filthy

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pritchards Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree on Crossfield St nearest to Eton Ave, 22nd July
item.description:
Diseased dead tree leaning significantly towards my house! it was not like this before, there are cracks in the pavement where it started leaning! Urgent request to check if it needs to be removed!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Crossfield Road, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Neighbour at 3 keeps flytipping her rubbish on the corner, 22nd July
item.description:
This is a common occurrence, and this time she’s left her kids paddling pool on the corner along with other trash - a mirror? And a cabinet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Scarlet Close, Poverest, London

item.title: Extreme wet dog besides a tree which is in front of 95 Fernhead Road., 22nd July
item.description:
Extreme wet dog fouling on besides a tree which is in front of 95 Fernhead Road. People get in and out their cars besides this tree and people cross the road besides this tree and children often play around this tree. Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Liquid leak from driveway, 22nd July
item.description:
Leak from driveway, leaking onto pavement, moss and algae forming where the liquid has spilled across the pavement. Slip hazard. Been ongoing for years. In winter liquid freezes and is dangerous to walk on.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Downs Hill, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Builders rubbish in the small front garden, 22nd July

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Valmar Road, Camberwell, London

item.title: Illegal Sofa Dumping Next to My Fence – Request for Action, 22nd July
item.description:
I am writing to report that a sofa has been illegally dumped next to my fence at 7 Douglas Rd This was not placed there by me, and I consider it a case of fly-tipping. I have photographic evidence showing the sofa and can provide it upon request . I would appreciate it if you could arrange for its removal and investigate further if possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bruce Close, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
